title: Iconic Film Trailer Sound Effects
description: Cause some serious sonic mayhem with Iconic Film Trailer, a modern & powerful curated collection of sought after epic movie trailer styled sound effects.
longDescription:
Audio Demos


This sound library features over 290+ destructive impacts, stock punchy trailer hits, tense risers, suspenseful long form drones and loops, plus has a boat load of choice transitions, cinematic whooshes, braaams & more.

Inspired by box office hits like The Avengers, Batman & superhero movies all alike, Iconic Film Trailer sound effects quickly becomes a go to addition to your audio arsenal when working in post production.

Included sounds: suspenseful tension drones, big beefy trailer hits, long & short risers, complex to minimal cinematic whooshes, abstract movie synth tones, hybrid textures, transitions, endless drone loops, braaams & more. You get everything you hear in the audio demos minus the movie trailer voices & music background track.

The library is organized neatly into popular categories that make it easier to create outstanding immersive cinematic audio experiences. It includes the following folders: Booms, Braaams, Drone Loops, Drones, Impacts, Risers, Synth Tones, & Transitions.


All of the sound effects files are designed to make your life easier, production workflow faster and delivered in high quality 44.1k/16Bit .wav file format to maintain top-notch audio fidelity. Iconic Film Trailer’s premixed audio is ready to drag and drop into your game and movie trailer. Simply choose the format that suits your project best and unleash destruction!
technicalDetails:
All in Product details:

  • 299 sound effects
  • 4.39 GB of cinematic sound
  • Every sound type needed for epic trailers.
  • A cinematic sound designer must have!
  • Perfect for movie trailers and cinematic productions.
  • Over 125 minutes of audio FX
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • All royalty-free RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
  • 17 big bass-y impacts & booms
  • 10 braaam strikes, and tonal horn blasts
  • 48 drone loops
  • 48 long format drones and soundscapes – most over 1+ minutes
  • 53 big movie trailer impacts & title screen hits
  • 50 tension & suspense evoking risers
  • 15 abstract trailer synths & tone SFX
  • 58 pass-bys, transitions & cinematic whooshes
  • Compatible with any DAW
